title: Jimmie O'Sullivan
text:
James Michael O'Sullivan (5 February 1883 – 21 December 1960) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Back%20row">loose forward</a>, O'Sullivan represented at a provincial level, and was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, from 1905 to 1907. He played 29 matches for the All Blacks five of which were internationals, including the famous ""<a href="Match%20of%20the%20Century%20%28rugby%20union%29">Match of the Century</a>"" against <a href="Wales%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Wales</a>. He later served as president of the Taranaki Rugby Union.
O'Sullivan died in <a href="H%C4%81wera">Hāwera</a> on 21 December 1960, and was buried at Hāwera Cemetery.
